00041 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( FileOutputTest );
00042 
00043 static bool CompareFloats(float f1, float f2)
00044 {
00045         const float EPS = 0.0000001f;
00046         return (fabs(f1-f2) < EPS);
00047 }

00059 void FileOutputTest::testdefine_SIZES()
00060 {
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(int8_t) == 1 );
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(int16_t) == 2 );
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(int32_t) == 4 );
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(int64_t) == 8 );
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(u_int8_t) == 1 );
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(u_int16_t) == 2 );
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(u_int32_t) == 4 );
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(u_int64_t) == 8 );
00069 }
00070 
00071 void FileOutputTest::testmethod_WriteInt8()
00072 {
00073         ofstream outstr;
00074         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00075         outstr.open(file.c_str(), ios::out);
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( outstr );
00077         int8_t val;
00078 
00079         val=11;
00080         FileOutput::WriteInt8(outstr, val);
00081         val=-22;
00082         FileOutput::WriteInt8(outstr, val);
00083         val=33;
00084         FileOutput::WriteInt8(outstr, val);
00085         outstr.close();
00086 
00087         ifstream instr;
00088         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in);
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00090         instr.read((char *) &val, sizeof(val));
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( val == 11 );
00092         instr.read((char *) &val, sizeof(val));
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( val == -22 );
00094         instr.read((char *) &val, sizeof(val));
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( val == 33 );
00096 }

00125 void FileOutputTest::testmethod_WriteInt16()
00126 {
00127         ofstream outstr;
00128         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00129         outstr.open(file.c_str(), ios::out);
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( outstr );
00131         int16_t val;
00132 
00133         val=101;
00134         FileOutput::WriteInt16(outstr, val);
00135         val=-202;
00136         FileOutput::WriteInt16(outstr, val);
00137         val=303;
00138         FileOutput::WriteInt16(outstr, val);
00139         outstr.close();
00140 
00141         ifstream instr;
00142         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in);
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00144         instr.read((char *) &val, sizeof(val));
00145         val = ntohs(val);
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( val == 101 );
00147         instr.read((char *) &val, sizeof(val));
00148         val = ntohs(val);
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( val == -202 );
00150         instr.read((char *) &val, sizeof(val));
00151         val = ntohs(val);
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( val == 303 );
00153 }

00245 void FileOutputTest::testmethod_WriteFloat()
00246 {
00247         ofstream outstr;
00248         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00249         outstr.open(file.c_str(), ios::out);
00250         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( outstr );
00251         float val;
00252 
00253         val=1.1f;
00254         FileOutput::WriteFloat(outstr, val);
00255         val=-2.2f;
00256         FileOutput::WriteFloat(outstr, val);
00257         val=3.3f;
00258         FileOutput::WriteFloat(outstr, val);
00259         outstr.close();
00260 
00261         int32_t ival;
00262         ifstream instr;
00263         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in);
00264         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00265         instr.read((char *) &ival, sizeof(ival));
00266         ival = ntohl(ival);
00267     memcpy(&val, &ival, sizeof(ival));
00268         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( CompareFloats(val, 1.1f) );
00269         instr.read((char *) &ival, sizeof(ival));
00270         ival = ntohl(ival);
00271     memcpy(&val, &ival, sizeof(ival));
00272         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( CompareFloats(val, -2.2f) );
00273         instr.read((char *) &ival, sizeof(ival));
00274         ival = ntohl(ival);
00275     memcpy(&val, &ival, sizeof(ival));
00276         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( CompareFloats(val, 3.3f) );
00277 }

00279 void FileOutputTest::testmethod_WriteString8()
00280 {
00281         ofstream outstr;
00282         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00283         outstr.open(file.c_str(), ios::out);
00284         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( outstr );
00285         string val;
00286 
00287         val = "string";
00288         FileOutput::WriteString8(outstr, val);
00289         val = "test";
00290         FileOutput::WriteString8(outstr, val);
00291         val = "case";
00292         FileOutput::WriteString8(outstr, val);
00293         outstr.close();
00294 
00295         int32_t ival;
00296         char *buf=NULL;
00297         ifstream instr;
00298         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in);
00299         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00300 
00301         instr.read((char *) &ival, sizeof(ival));
00302         ival = ntohl(ival);
00303         buf = new char[ival+1];
00304         instr.read((char *) buf, ival);
00305         buf[ival] = 0;
00306         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( strcmp("string", buf) == 0);
00307         delete[] buf;
00308 
00309         instr.read((char *) &ival, sizeof(ival));
00310         ival = ntohl(ival);
00311         buf = new char[ival+1];
00312         instr.read((char *) buf, ival);
00313         buf[ival] = 0;
00314         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( strcmp("test", buf) == 0);
00315         delete[] buf;
00316 
00317         instr.read((char *) &ival, sizeof(ival));
00318         ival = ntohl(ival);
00319         buf = new char[ival+1];
00320         instr.read((char *) buf, ival);
00321         buf[ival] = 0;
00322         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( strcmp("case", buf) == 0);
00323         delete[] buf;
00324 }

00326 void FileOutputTest::testmethod_WriteString8_fixedlen()
00327 {
00328         ofstream outstr;
00329         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00330         outstr.open(file.c_str(), ios::out);
00331         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( outstr );
00332         string val;
00333 
00334         val = "string";
00335         FileOutput::WriteString8(outstr, val.c_str(), (int32_t) val.length());
00336         val = "test";
00337         FileOutput::WriteString8(outstr, val.c_str(), (int32_t) val.length());
00338         val = "case";
00339         FileOutput::WriteString8(outstr, val.c_str(), (int32_t) val.length());
00340         outstr.close();
00341 
00342         int32_t ival;
00343         char buf[128];
00344         ifstream instr;
00345         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in);
00346         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00347 
00348         ival = (int32_t) strlen("string");
00349         instr.read((char *) buf, ival);
00350         buf[ival]=0;
00351         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( strcmp("string", buf) == 0);
00352 
00353         ival = (int32_t) strlen("test");
00354         instr.read((char *) buf, ival);
00355         buf[ival]=0;
00356         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( strcmp("test", buf) == 0);
00357 
00358         ival = (int32_t) strlen("case");
00359         instr.read((char *) buf, ival);
00360         buf[ival]=0;
00361         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( strcmp("case", buf) == 0);
00362 
00363 }

00365 void FileOutputTest::testmethod_WriteString16()
00366 {
00367         ofstream outstr;
00368         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00369         outstr.open(file.c_str(), ios::out);
00370         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( outstr );
00371         wstring val;
00372 
00373         val = L"string";
00374         FileOutput::WriteString16(outstr, val);
00375         val = L"test";
00376         FileOutput::WriteString16(outstr, val);
00377         val = L"case";
00378         FileOutput::WriteString16(outstr, val);
00379         outstr.close();
00380 
00381         ifstream instr;
00382         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in);
00383         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00384 
00385         val = FileInput::ReadString16(instr);
00386         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( val == L"string");
00387 
00388         val = FileInput::ReadString16(instr);
00389         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( val == L"test");
00390 
00391         val = FileInput::ReadString16(instr);
00392         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( val == L"case");
00393 }

00395 void FileOutputTest::testmethod_WriteString16_fixedlen()
00396 {
00397         ofstream outstr;
00398         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00399         outstr.open(file.c_str(), ios::out);
00400         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( outstr );
00401         wstring val;
00402 
00403         val = L"string";
00404         FileOutput::WriteString16(outstr, val.c_str(), (int32_t) val.length());
00405         val = L"test";
00406         FileOutput::WriteString16(outstr, val.c_str(), (int32_t) val.length());
00407         val = L"case";
00408         FileOutput::WriteString16(outstr, val.c_str(), (int32_t) val.length());
00409         outstr.close();
00410 
00411 
00412         ifstream instr;
00413         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in);
00414         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00415 
00416         val = FileInput::ReadString16(instr, (int32_t) strlen("string"));
00417         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( val == L"string");
00418 
00419         val = FileInput::ReadString16(instr, (int32_t) strlen("test"));
00420         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( val == L"test");
00421 
00422         val = FileInput::ReadString16(instr, (int32_t) strlen("case"));
00423         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( val == L"case");
00424 }

00426 void FileOutputTest::testmethod_WriteBlob()
00427 {
00428         ofstream outstr;
00429         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00430         outstr.open(file.c_str(), ios::out);
00431         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( outstr );
00432         wstring val;
00433 
00434         val = L"this is some random string";
00435         FileOutput::WriteBlob(outstr, (void*)val.c_str(), sizeof(wchar_t)*val.length());
00436 
00437         val = L"The Sharks are on the verge of eliminating the Predators";
00438         FileOutput::WriteBlob(outstr, (void*)val.c_str(), sizeof(wchar_t)*val.length());
00439 
00440         outstr.close();
00441 
00442         ifstream instr;
00443         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in);
00444         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00445 
00446         wstring expectedValue;
00447         const void* value = 0;
00448         int32_t size = FileInput::ReadBlob(instr, value);
00449         expectedValue = L"this is some random string";
00450         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(size == expectedValue.length()*sizeof(wchar_t));
00451         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(value, (void*)expectedValue.c_str(), size) == 0);
00452 
00453         size = FileInput::ReadBlob(instr, value);
00454         expectedValue = L"The Sharks are on the verge of eliminating the Predators";
00455         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(size == expectedValue.length()*sizeof(wchar_t));
00456         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(value, (void*)expectedValue.c_str(), size) == 0);
00457 }

00459 void FileOutputTest::testmethod_WriteBlobWithReserve()
00460 {
00461         ofstream outstr;
00462         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00463         outstr.open(file.c_str(), ios::out);
00464         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( outstr );
00465         wstring val;
00466 
00467         val = L"no sugar tonight - The Guess Who";
00468         FileOutput::WriteBlob(outstr, (void*)val.c_str(), sizeof(wchar_t)*val.length(), sizeof(wchar_t)*val.length()+10);
00469 
00470         val = L"pinball wizard - The Who";
00471         FileOutput::WriteBlob(outstr, (void*)val.c_str(), sizeof(wchar_t)*val.length(), sizeof(wchar_t)*val.length()+10);
00472 
00473         outstr.close();
00474 
00475         ifstream instr;
00476         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in);
00477         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00478 
00479         wstring expectedValue;
00480         const void* value = 0;
00481         int32_t size = FileInput::ReadBlob(instr, value);
00482         expectedValue = L"no sugar tonight - The Guess Who";
00483         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(size == expectedValue.length()*sizeof(wchar_t)+10);
00484         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(value, (void*)expectedValue.c_str(), expectedValue.length()*sizeof(wchar_t)) == 0);
00485 
00486         size = FileInput::ReadBlob(instr, value);
00487         expectedValue = L"pinball wizard - The Who";
00488         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(size == expectedValue.length()*sizeof(wchar_t)+10);
00489         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(value, (void*)expectedValue.c_str(), expectedValue.length()*sizeof(wchar_t)) == 0);
00490 }
